item.title: 玻利维亚紧急销毁空难中从天而降的现金
item.description: 玻利维亚当局正紧急销毁价值可能高达数百万美元的本国货币——这些钞票在该国第二大城市的一场致命空难中突然从天而降。【原文：Bolivian authorities are scrambling to destroy what likely amounts to millions of dollars worth of local currency that suddenly fell from the sky in a deadly plane crash in the country’s second largest city.】

item.title: 以色列因伊朗袭击事件关闭天然气田
item.description: 以色列在与美国联合对伊朗发动袭击后，下令暂时关闭部分天然气田。【原文：Israel ordered the temporary shutdown of some natural gas fields after launching an attack on Iran in a joint operation with the US.】

item.title: 美国农民将特朗普的新关税视为又一轮不稳定因素
item.description: 在特朗普总统实施关税政策后动荡不安的一年里，美国农民一直在寻求某种稳定。但随着上周新的贸易动荡，不确定性正日益成为唯一不变的因素。【原文：US farmers have been looking for some stability after a mercurial year under President Donald Trump’s tariffs. But after new trade upheaval last week, it’s becoming increasingly clear that uncertainty is the only constant.】

item.title: 中国呼吁美以轰炸伊朗后立即停火
item.description: 在美以对伊朗发动袭击后，中国呼吁立即停火，习近平政府正权衡在中东地区的应对方案。【原文：China called for an immediate ceasefire following the US and Israel’s attacks on Iran, as President Xi Jinping’s government weighs its options in the Middle East.】

item.title: 英国财政部与国防部冲突公开化
item.description: 英国财政部与国防部之间围绕一项旨在改造英国军队的巨额支出计划的长期争端本周浮出水面，起因是该计划引发了对一份价值10亿英镑（13亿美元）直升机合同的质疑。【原文：A simmering dispute between the Treasury and Ministry of Defense over a massive spending plan designed to transform Britain’s military tumbled into public view this week after it raised doubts about a £1 billion ($1.3 billion) helicopter contract.】

item.title: 原油与黄金因超流动性而上涨，加密货币价格全天候反映伊朗风险
item.description: 随着美国、以色列与伊朗之间的冲突不断升级，全球市场情绪受到冲击，部分投资者开始寻求全天候对冲工具，加密货币交易者于周末纷纷涌向去中心化交易所Hyperliquid。【原文：Crypto traders flocked to decentralized exchange Hyperliquid over the weekend as the escalating conflict between the US, Israel and Iran rattled global sentiment and sent some investors seeking round-the-clock hedges.】

item.title: 特朗普不愿承认关税是错误，但我们大多数人确实后悔
item.description: 前索尼首席执行官迈克尔·林顿与投资者乔什·施泰纳阐述了他们从那些广为人知的失误中汲取的教训。【原文：Former Sony head Michael Lynton and investor Josh Steiner explain what they learned from their very public mistakes.】

item.title: 欧洲和中国目前只能梦想与美元抗衡
item.description: 拥有真正全球化的货币存在弊端，而双方均未表明已准备好接受这一现实。【原文：Having a truly global currency has its downside, and neither has suggested it’s ready to accept that.】

item.title: 伊朗遭袭：特朗普发动攻击之际，石油市场面临何种风险
item.description: 唐纳德·特朗普总统对伊朗采取军事打击的决定，给全球相当一部分石油供应带来了新的风险。【原文：President Donald Trump’s decision to strike Iran creates new risks for a significant chunk of the world’s oil supply.】

item.title: 绘制全球经济图景：特朗普在败诉后继续推进关税政策
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普在最高法院遭遇重大挫折后，正继续推进其关税议程，试图通过不同途径实施加征关税。【原文：US President Donald Trump is pressing on with his tariff agenda after a major setback from the Supreme Court, looking to use different avenues to enact the levies.】

item.description: 以色列周六宣布对伊朗发动先发制人打击后，比特币及其他数字资产价格大幅下跌。【原文：Bitcoin and other digital assets fell sharply after Israel said it launched a preemptive strike on Iran on Saturday.】

item.title: 大选惨败后，斯塔默的清算日日益临近
item.description: 本周，将基尔·斯塔默推上首相宝座的策略已走到尽头。其设计者们已离开大楼。现在的问题是，什么将取而代之——以及议员们是否会给英国首相时间来贯彻新策略。【原文：The strategy that brought Keir Starmer to Downing Street ran out of road this week. Its architects have left the building. The question now is what takes its place — and whether members of Parliament give the UK prime minister time to see it through.】

item.title: 肯尼亚央行行长认为经济复苏势头将持续，尽管税收压力增大
item.description: 卡马乌·图格坚称自己管理肯尼亚中央银行的工作很轻松。投资者对此感到惊讶也是情有可原。【原文：Kamau Thugge insists his job running Kenya’s central bank is easy. Investors may be forgiven for doing a double take.】

item.title: 锂生产商SQM预计今年全球需求将增长25%
item.description: 全球最大锂生产商SQM表示，随着行业摆脱全球供应过剩的困境，该公司季度销量创下历史新高，预计今年全球对这种电池金属的需求将增长约25%。【原文：Top lithium producer SQM said it sees world demand for the battery metal growing about 25% this year, after reporting record quarterly sales volume as the industry emerges from a global glut.】

item.title: 马来西亚最大养老基金设定2025年股息率为6.15%
item.description: 马来西亚最大养老基金宣布，其传统储蓄账户与伊斯兰储蓄账户2025年度股息率均为6.15%。该年度因不可预测的贸易政策导致市场剧烈震荡。【原文：Malaysia’s largest pension fund declared a 6.15% dividend for both its conventional and Shariah savings accounts for 2025, a year where unpredictable trade policies whipsawed markets.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦、阿富汗威胁在超级大国关注的地区开战
item.description: 巴基斯坦与阿富汗本周濒临全面战争边缘，加剧了该地区的紧张局势——世界经济超级大国正在此地争夺影响力。【原文：Pakistan and Afghanistan edged closer to all-out war this week, escalating tensions in a region where the world’s economic superpowers are vying for influence.】

item.title: OpenAI在与Anthropic争议后向五角大楼开放AI模型访问权限
item.description: 在竞争对手Anthropic PBC因监控和自主武器问题与五角大楼的关系破裂后，OpenAI已同意在其国防部机密网络内部署自身的人工智能模型。【原文：OpenAI has agreed to deploy its own artificial intelligence models within the Defense Department’s classified network after rival Anthropic PBC saw its relationship with the Pentagon implode over surveillance and autonomous weapons concerns.】

item.title: 中国融资规模激增，再融资与债券发行蓬勃发展
item.description: 国家统计局数据显示，受股权再融资和债券发行激增推动，中国资本市场去年实现反弹。【原文：China’s capital markets rebounded last year, fueled by a surge in equity refinancing and bond issuance, according to the National Bureau of Statistics.】

item.title: 和记黄埔将出售True Corp. 10%股权，瑞银集团为主要买家
item.description: 泰国企业集团正大集团计划出售旗下电信子公司True Corp.的10%股权，其中大部分股份将售予瑞银集团。【原文：Thai business conglomerate Charoen Pokphand Group plans to sell a 10% stake in its telecommunications affiliate True Corp., with most of the shares going to UBS Group AG.】

item.title: OpenAI与五角大楼达成协议，将部署人工智能模型
item.description: OpenAI表示已与美国战争部达成协议，将在其机密网络中部署其模型。【原文：OpenAI said it has reached an agreement with the US Department of War to deploy its models in their classified network.】

item.title: 载有银行现金的玻利维亚飞机坠毁，造成至少10人死亡
item.description: 一架载有央行现金的玻利维亚军用运输机在该国西部埃尔阿托国际机场附近坠毁，造成10多人死亡，另有若干人受伤。【原文：A Bolivian military aircraft transporting cash for the central bank crashed near El Alto International Airport in the western part of the country, leaving more than 10 people dead and an unspecified number injured.】

item.title: 五角大楼对Anthropic的人工智能业务提出质疑
item.description: 人类本位PBC今年开局势如破竹，销售额激增、多款爆款产品问世以及一轮大规模融资，使这家初创企业在成本高昂的全球人工智能竞赛中占据显著优势。【原文：Anthropic PBC started this year on a winning streak, with surging sales, multiple viral products and a large funding round all giving the startup a big advantage in the costly global AI race.】

item.title: 特朗普政府寻求推迟关税退税诉讼
item.description: 特朗普政府正试图推迟法庭审理程序，以确定是否必须向进口商退还数十亿美元关税——这些关税近期已被美国最高法院裁定无效。此举标志着新一轮法律争端阶段的激烈开端。【原文：The Trump administration is seeking to delay court proceedings over whether it must refund importers billions of dollars in tariffs recently struck down by the US Supreme Court, marking a contentious start to the next phase of the legal fight.】

item.title: 阿根廷国会批准劳工改革，米莱取得胜利
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔·米莱标志性的劳工改革法案在参议院扫清了最后障碍，这是这位自由主义者雄心勃勃议程中的一场关键胜利，有望助力这个南美国家重返全球市场。【原文：Argentine President Javier Milei’s signature labor reform cleared its final hurdle in the Senate, a pivotal victory in the libertarian’s ambitious agenda that could help the South American nation return to global markets.】

item.title: 前美银美林银行家将在全球内幕交易案中认罪
item.description: 前美银美林投资银行家计划从法国返回美国，就向全球内幕交易团伙成员泄露内幕消息一事认罪。【原文：A former Moelis & Co. investment banker plans to return to the US from France to plead guilty to tipping off members of a global insider-trading ring.】

item.title: 派拉蒙将把华纳575亿美元债务重组为垃圾债与高评级债混合结构
item.description: 派拉蒙天空舞影业公司收购华纳兄弟探索公司的交易预计将采用投资级与垃圾级债券的非典型组合融资方案。华尔街银行正竭力开拓各类市场，为这笔收购筹集575亿美元债务资金。【原文：Paramount Skydance Corp.’s takeover of Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. is expected to feature an unusual combination of investment-grade and junk-rated debt, as Wall Street banks turn to as many markets as possible to raise $57.5 billion of debt for the acquisition.】

item.title: 大卫·埃里森正重整CBS新闻部；CNN或将面临同样局面
item.description: 在周四晚间的新闻播报中，美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）主播杰克·塔珀陷入尴尬境地：他不得不报道自己供职的华纳兄弟探索公司被派拉蒙天舞公司收购的消息。【原文：During his Thursday night newscast, CNN anchor Jake Tapper found himself in an awkward position: reporting on the sale of his employer, Warner Bros. Discovery Inc., to Paramount Skydance Corp.】
